name: Charts UI Kit
description:
A Developer-friendly chart kit compatible with chart.js and Fusion Chart. All charts have responsive and dark mode options.


  • Radar Chart
  • Polar Area Chart
  • Pie Chart
  • Doughnut Chart
  • Filled Chart
  • Line Chart
  • Bar Chart
  • Line&Bar Chart
  • Bullet Line Chart
